org.hkijena.jipipe.api.data.storage

Interface JIPipeReadDataStorage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, JIPipeDataStorage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JIPipeFileSystemReadDataStorage

    public interface JIPipeReadDataStorage
extends JIPipeDataStorage
    JIPipeDataStorage that is used for reading files into a JIPipeData instance.

    • Method Summary

      • findFilesByExtension

        default List<Path> findFilesByExtension(String... extensions)
        Lists all file elements that have given extension. Extension matching is case-insensitive.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        files ending with given extensions

      • findFileByExtension

        default Optional<Path> findFileByExtension(String... extensions)
        Finds the first matching file by extension. Extension matching is case-insensitive.
        Parameters:
        extensions - extensions
        Returns:
        the fist file that matches or an empty Optional
